org.apache.kafka.common.acl

Class AclBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.common.acl.AclBinding

  • @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class AclBinding
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a binding between a resource and an access control entry. The API for this class is still evolving and we may break compatibility in minor releases, if necessary.

    • Constructor Summary
